HeadStart | The Challenge
HeadStart 2015 update
Collectively you have contributed to 5,800 hours of volunteering!
Logging your hours
Please have ALL hours logged by January 31st (to be invited to an interview)
We are aware that some of you started your volunteering a little later so if you need a time extension or are worried about not completing please email us: headstart@the-challenge.org
Log your hours here https://www.thechallengesociety.org/
If your login doesn’t work after the first attempt please try again.
* * *
Workshop 2 Customer Service in Action Workshop
For those of you that couldn’t make it in December we are putting it on this workshop again.
Starbucks: February 18th & 19th (haf-term)
New Look: Evenings in March (TBC)
Invite for February will be emailed next week.
* * *
Workshop 3 (AGL Communication Specialists)
Saturday 21st March 2015, 9.30am-12.30pm
Saturday 13th June 2015, 9.30am-12.30pm
AGL are communication experts and will train you to feel confident when talking about your volunteering experience to employers. Look out for an email invite soon..
IMPORTANT: There will be a compulsory information and Q&A session after each AGL workshop. This session will prepare you with the practical information you will need for your interview. Even if you cannot attend AGL, you must attend this session to be eligable for interview.
Look out for an email invite soon.
* * *
Interview dates
The interviews are for part time paid summer jobs.
Once we confirm you have completed your 16 hours we will invite you to one of the following
interviews nearer the time:
Starbucks: 30th March & 7th, 8th,10th April (Easter holidays)
New Look: June/July
Lloyds TBC
Please email headstart@the-challenge.org if you have any questions
Keep up the volunteering, you are all making a huge difference.
